:::{.bio-column-left}
Fonti is an evolutionary biologist wearing R developer shoes. Her interests include biostatistics, reproducible science, learning about the latest coding practices and teaching others to enjoy using R. Her work at ALA as a Data Analyst involves streamlining data cleaning workflows.
